data.text:
Malama Ka Po'e

Grover is forced to take his family on the run when a dangerous mob boss seeks revenge for an old case dating back 15 years.

The End Game

Emilia and Margot Vance, two attractive twins in their 30s, are found murdered. For the team, it seems clear that the Gig Harbor Murderer is back.

Boom

Grissom, Sara and Warrick set out to determine who was responsible for the bombing of an office building in Las Vegas. Nick is suspected of murdering a prostitute.

Beauty and the Beast

New York attorney Carl Sack joins the team and causes a stir, while Jerry takes a new lawyer under his wing.
